name: RealityBites
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A series of insights, ideas and strategies from Mark Purvis, CEO of the Mark Purvis Group and founder of YourTrueWorth.Life and The Reality Practice. Listen to hear more about strategies to accelerate your Self-Worth, Wealth, Impact, Success, Value, Legacy and more. 

This Flash Briefing skill may contain profanity because we’re talking about reality and it gets real. Hey, like you’ve never said an inside word out-loud…yeah right.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
